title: Availability
description: An object describing the availability of a set of elements.

bitstream.description: Index of a buffer view that indicates whether each element is available. The bitstream conforms to the boolean array encoding described in the [3D Metadata specification](../../specification/Metadata). If an element is available, its bit is 1, and if it is unavailable, its bit is 0.

availableCount.description: A number indicating how many 1 bits exist in the availability bitstream.

constant.description: Integer indicating whether all of the elements are available (1) or all are unavailable (0).
